titleStmt.title: Foure paradoxes 1 A byshop and a minister is all one. 2 A byshoppe or deacon shoulde not bee called Grace, Lord, or exercise such authoritie. 3 A popish priest is no lawful minister of the gospel. 4 Canon chauncellours, & officials are no meete officers in the churche of God.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyarde, at the signe of the Lucrece, by Thomas Purfoote,

notesStmt.note: Imprint and printer's device (McKerrow 151) on verso of pi1, bound before A1, title page.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
